data.title: 📌 Blog Post Published
data.description: How hard can it be to write a book? Based on my experience, it can take a very long time, can require a lot of back filling, and feel like the end is a distant dream. Joy and hope however, are ever present.

data.title: 📚 New Creative Project Added
data.description: A new creative writing project titled 'The Barn' has been added to the Creative section. Explore the eerie tale of a farmer's unsettling discovery.
